    • popErrorMessages

      public static ArrayList<String> popErrorMessages(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Returns:
      an arrayList of error message or null if no messages, the messages are then removed from the session upon return from this call.

    • popInfoMessages

      public static ArrayList<String> popInfoMessages(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Returns:
